title: Danny Hudson
content:
Danny Hudson (born 25 June 1979) is an English footballer who played in The Football League for Rotherham United. He also played non-League football for Doncaster Rovers, Halifax Town and Belper Town.[1]
He retired from football to pursue a career as a prison officer.

This biographical article related to association football in England, about a midfielder born in the 1970s, is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
